title: 8 days later Riot
body: Hi, 8 days later problem with a game are not resolved for bulgarian players. Tell me what must to do for a play normall again. All things in game are freezy for a few minutes. I cant start game, cant forge, cant see my profile, cant do anything normall. So tell me please, what must to do?

replies.body: Another Bulgarian with the same problem for almost 2 weeks now
Lots of EU countries have the same problem.
This has been going on for weeks now and Riot is worrying about the Honor system instead of fixing the issue, I'm really running out of patience

I know a lot of players on EUNE have been going through a tough time lately with all these connection issues, and it sucks.  I wish I could do something to make things easier, but we don't have control over ISPs.  We've been checking for updates, and have posted pinned threads [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) as well as [EU boards](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/9aupEmoP-23-06-17-issues-with-bulgaria-and-surrounding-regions) on this issue and wanting to get this fixed and get you back in game.

Players in Bulgaria and sorrounding regions have been impacted the hardest.  Currently, we believe that trying a VPN or configuring DNS per the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide could help by re-routing how you get to the game server.  The culprit appears to be a bad node when your network travels to get to us.  If you're still having an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well.  Our tech team can take another look with you and try to find more options specific to your case.  Hang tight!

OK tnx, i can play only aram but everything is so hard to be maked. I need 30mins to 1 hour to start one aram. I change DNS but its do nothing.  Now its mision impossible. I understand that you are out of control over ISPs but may be you can send email  to them to fix network travels. We can make too in our side and we trust that all be fine, soon.

EDIT P.S. Now I enjoy a 30 minute ban for too much declined. Today for a second time.
